title: 24 Best Early Prime Day Deals Under $100 That Come in Under Budget (2025)
description: Act quickly—these five-star products won't last long
author: Audrey Lee, Blake Bakkila
excerpt: The best early Prime Day deals under $100 on tech, furniture, and decor are here. Get in early—these five-star products won't last long
text: All products featured on Architectural Digest are independently selected by our editors. html:
All products featured on Architectural Digest are independently selected by our editors. However, we may receive compensation from retailers and/or from purchases of products through these links.

If you’re anything like us, then you appreciate a good markdown. So we think you’re gonna like the best early Prime Day deals under $100, and we’re seeing more added to the site every day.

Last year’s Prime Day event took place in mid-July and we can now confirm that July 8-11 are this year’s official dates. Since the early bird gets the worm (and we don’t want you to experience any FOMO), we’ve combed through the early promotions in search of the best home deals under $100 you can scoop up right now. True to form, we’re seeing some of the best prices on best-selling cookware, cult-favorite kitchen appliances (including the Instant Pot and countless air fryers), home decor, and tech deals like Bluetooth speakers, laptop accessories, robot vacuums, and air purifiers—all under $100.

Our Top Picks:

  • Furniture: Walker Edison Mid Century Modern Nightstand, $120 $94
  • Decor: Loloi x Chris Loves Julia Judy Rug, $110 $67
  • Air Purifiers: Levoit Core Mini Air Purifier, $50 $40
  • Smart Home and Tech: Shark Rocket Ultra-Light Corded Bagless Vacuum, $120 $99
  • Kitchen Appliances: JoyJolt Layla White Wine Glasses (Set of 4), $50 $30

If you’re looking to come out of this year’s Prime Day sales event smelling like a rose, consider this your cheat sheet to kick off summer with some serious savings. In addition to an unbeatable price point, the below selections boast rave reviews and five-star ratings (AKA you'll want to act fast). Plus, you can also read more about our Amazon favorites, review our top choices for early Prime Day deals on furniture, mattresses, sheets, and bath towels too.

Furniture

Scouting out the best Amazon Prime furniture that’s both stylish and affordable can definitely feel like an endless scroll, which is why we’ve gone ahead and done the work for you. Whether you’re looking for a budget-friendly home office upgrade in the form of a sturdy office chair, some extra storage, or a handsome dining table (that's technically over $100 but we still think is a great deal), we've got Prime members covered on the best furniture deals under $100.

Yamazaki Home Freestanding Coat Rack

Walker Edison Mid Century Modern Nightstand

Lerliuo Rattan Nightstand

Vecelo Platform Bed Frame

Winsome Groveland Dining Table

Sweetcrispy Ergonomic Desk Chair

Decor

While it may take some digging, Amazon’s home decor section has some impressive gems—including mid century silhouettes and Bauhaus designs. Cozy up your space with a new area rug or upgrade your fruit bowl game.

Loloi x Chris Loves Julia Judy Rug

Creative Co-Op Round Hammered Metal Bowl

BEAUTYPEAK Arch Floor Mirror

Safavieh La Jolla Rug

Air Purifiers

Combatting airborne dust, dander, and allergens is easy when you have a top-of-the-line filtration device. And though clean air is a must with an excess of allergens floating about, we don’t think it should come at great expense to your wallet. In addition to countless highly rated purifiers for larger spaces, we found multiple buys for under $100 from top brands like Dreo, Levoit, and more.

Levoit Core Mini Air Purifier

GermGuardian Air Purifier

Lasko Oscillating Tower Fan

Mooka Air Purifier

Amazon Devices, Smart home, and Prime Day Tech Deals

No need to wait until Black Friday to snag some tech gadgets. Take this as a sign to shop top-notch smart home devices right now—and at under $100 a pop, no less. Apple wireless earbuds with noise cancellation, OLED smart TVs, Ring video doorbells, Alexa-enabled Amazon Echo Dots, and the Amazon Fire TV stick are all discounted right now, with the retailer offering some of the lowest prices we’ve seen on lots of other gems too. Think a Wi-Fi enabled security camera, Kindle e-reader, an Anker power bank to lengthen your phone’s battery life, and more—no coupon needed.

Anker 622 Magnetic Battery

Waterpik Cordless Pearl Rechargeable Portable Water Flosser

Apple AirPods 4

Tapo by TP-Link Smart Plug Mini (3-Pack)

Roku Ultra 2024

Sony WH-CH520 Wireless Headphones

Cordless Vacuums, Cleaning Tech, Home Improvement

These deals may not be glamorous, but they’re critical for maintaining a spotless (or at least less messy) home. Right now, Bissell’s stick vacuums are seriously discounted, as well as Black + Decker’s cordless vacuum options. We also threw in a well-rated Bissell steamer (though Amazon’s best selling steamer clocks in at just $45 over budget) and our favorite hands-free toilet bowl cleaner from Blueland, beloved by commerce writer Julia Harrison and commerce director Rachel Fletcher for its ease of use and impact.

Bissell CleanView Compact Upright Vacuum

Black & Decker BHFEA520J Cordless Stick Vacuum

Shark Rocket Ultra-Light Corded Bagless Vacuum

Ayontin Cordless Handheld Vacuum

Kitchen Accessories

Maybe you’ve finally succumbed to the Instant Pot lifestyle or are simply in the mood to upgrade your food processor—either way Amazon will never let you down with their seemingly endless supply of kitchen deals. The site is stocked with dozens of top-rated air fryers, plus every brand of blender, coffee maker, slow cooker, and toaster oven under the sun. For our part, we think the Le Creuset stoneware cocotte is an always-appropriate gift, and a necessity for any fans of tomato or garlic confit. And, according to commerce writer Julia Harrison, the mega-popular Alpha Grille meat thermometer select is “a $16 insurance policy.”

JoyJolt Layla White Wine Glasses (Set of 4)

Bodum Pour Over Coffee Maker

Keurig K-Express Coffee Maker

OXO Good Grips Stainless Steel Salad Spinner

Staub Ceramic Rectangular Baking Dishes (Set of 3)

Zwilling J.A. Henckels Twin Signature Santoku Knife

Alpha Grillers Instant Read Meat Thermometer

Braun MQ5025 Hand Blender Multiquick Vario

What is Amazon Prime Day? (And what to shop now)

The epic sales event known as Amazon Prime Day is your time to score limited-time deals on all the home upgrades you’ll need for the rest of the season. The mega retailer's annual shopping event for Prime members offers steep discounts on everything from robot vacuums and Amazon devices to mattresses and couches. Prime Day is also known for its Lightning Deals—spotlight items that are on sale for a super limited time—so we recommend watching this space so you won’t miss out.

When is Amazon Prime Day?

This year, Amazon announced a super-sized version of its annual Prime Day, slated for July 8th through July 11th. This means Prime members will have double the usual time to scoop up discounts on high-end tech, splurge worthy furniture, and upgraded bedding (though we can’t guarantee deals will last through the entire sales period so don’t dilly dally). In anticipation of the sale, the AD shopping team has been busy rounding up all of the best deals we’re spotting ahead of Prime Day—from deals under $100 to our favorite on-sale furniture finds.
